# 零知识证明隐私交易演示
### 生成零知识证明参数
```shell
zktx_example# cargo run --release --bin gen_params
zktx_example# ls
Cargo.lock  Cargo.toml  PARAMS  README.md  config.json  src  target
```
参数文件位于PARAMS目录中。

### 运行CITA节点

将生成的 PARAMS 目录拷贝到 CITA发布目录的`resource`目录下。

运行 `admintool` 生成节点配置文件，并运行CITA节点。

参见 [文档](https://cryptape.github.io/cita/getting_started/)

### 运行隐私交易客户端

编译 `client`
```shell
cargo build --release --bin client
```
将编译生成的可执行文件，参数文件，以及config文件放到同一个目录中
```shell
zktx_client# ls
PARAMS  client  config.json
```
运行client
```shell
zktx_client# ./client 
```
输出如下，有精简，并增加一些解释的文字：
```shell
#从配置文件中导入alice和bob的CITA帐号
acount = [Account { secret: e87afec259dd82f42ab745e17a3a8f18a7a7a33d2d8cbdb2a57358e97b494af5, public: 198e59b08ec46cb6c98a2462e07f84e16458d06ae99e9b548bb3f420e62b7865acfe5aaf10aedb29ee952b976268d80b8fbf1a0dd396ae81ae39ff07baa592ba, address: 0011fa4f0bf8ae36c1f57b356c9b90541b7a9d18 }, Account { secret: 4f5604aac4db108683fda1d06a10f55fa14580e06fdff94a7dd17d3248975418, public: 58cfd18d386c25de4047eed20d245e500221e08ab8b834afe72f87f3e651a1ca84328d9122380fafaf58e8fa58a1272b2ecd42cd5b673ea22957bd9c3df54c72, address: 003262d90201537a7e04d86b438f20bb9c34966d }]

#订阅隐私交易合约中的log
height: 0x7
install filter BaseFilter { id: 0x0, transport: Http { id: AtomicUsize(2), url: "http://localhost:1337/", write_sender: UnboundedSender(Sender { inner: Inner { buffer: None, state: AtomicUsize(9223372036854775808), message_queue: Queue { head: AtomicPtr(0x7f03e8e75280), tail: UnsafeCell }, parked_queue: Queue { head: AtomicPtr(0x7f03e8e600a0), tail: UnsafeCell }, num_senders: AtomicUsize(3), recv_task: Mutex { data: ReceiverTask { unparked: false, task: Some(Task) } } }, sender_task: Mutex { data: SenderTask { task: None, is_parked: false } }, maybe_parked: false }) }, item: PhantomData }

#alice创建隐私帐号，并发送交易将自己的地址和余额（1001）设置到隐私交易合约中
height: 0x7

tx_response: TxResponse { hash: 6814d9382a28d1c07feeb07d9edfdca9c070d3415215728f0ab9ca3024821d1c, status: "OK" }
alice set_balance, waiting ...

#bob创建隐私帐号，并发送交易将自己的地址和余额（1000）设置到隐私交易合约中
height: 0xb

tx_response: TxResponse { hash: d5695765e104801e12b220fb76de94e69ad5a47aa0e1664e98eb0ff80a32b669, status: "OK" }
bob set_balance, waiting ...

# alice 转10个token给 bob，本地生成转账证明之后，将证明发送到隐私交易合约中
height: 0xe

tx_response: TxResponse { hash: cef6961aa22d8dd9d5c89722d65e3cadfa5869fc8f28af223583149046bb2811, status: "OK" }
alice send_verify, wait for log ...
wait for log ...
```
